title: Netflix has no USP, says analyst, against quality for Apple TV+, and family focus for Disney+
content:
Streaming video giant Netflix has no USP, argues an analyst, which is why its current dominance is in question as newer services challenge it with clearer unique selling points – like Apple TV+ …

more…
